name: Champion
description: Commanders who embody the highest ideals of honor and justice, inspiring allies with their heroic deeds and selfless protection of the innocent while standing as beacons of hope against darkness.

resource_systems.name: Stamina
resource_systems.description: Physical energy that powers combat abilities and heroic feats
mechanics: Stamina points are spent to perform special combat maneuvers and heroic abilities
Some abilities require maintaining focus, consuming stamina over time
Short rests restore a significant portion of maximum stamina
Depleted stamina causes penalties to attack speed and defensive capabilities
Can be temporarily boosted through righteous determination in critical situations
Protecting allies and upholding justice increases stamina regeneration

resource_systems.name: Combat Readiness
resource_systems.description: State of tactical awareness and preparation that enhances combat effectiveness
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds during combat, decreases during periods of inaction
mechanics: Increases by 20 when landing critical hits or successfully defending against attacks
Increases by 15 per 10 seconds in active combat
Decreases by 20 when taking critical hits or being caught off-guard
Decreases by 15 per minute when out of combat
Can be spent to enhance combat abilities or execute special maneuvers
Can be partially transferred to allies to improve their combat performance
Performing heroic deeds significantly increases Combat Readiness

resource_systems.name: Command Authority
resource_systems.description: Measure of leadership influence and tactical control over the battlefield
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when successfully leading allies or protecting the innocent
mechanics: Increases by 15 when allies successfully follow your tactical directions
Increases by 10 when protecting innocent civilians or upholding justice
Decreases by 15 when allies suffer significant casualties under your command
Decreases by 10 when forced to retreat or compromise your principles
Can be spent to issue powerful commands or implement heroic battle strategies
Higher Command Authority increases the morale and courage of all allies

resource_systems.name: Heroic Inspiration
resource_systems.description: Measure of your ability to inspire others through heroic deeds and noble example
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when performing heroic actions or upholding ideals of justice
mechanics: Increases by 15 when performing selfless acts to protect others
Increases by 20 when defeating powerful evil entities
Decreases by 10 when failing to protect innocents
Decreases by 15 when compromising moral principles for expedience
Can be spent to perform extraordinary heroic feats or inspire allies to greatness
At maximum Heroic Inspiration, enter a state of heroic excellence that greatly enhances all abilities

class_mechanics.name: Heroic Leadership
class_mechanics.description: Ability to inspire allies through personal example and heroic deeds
effects: Allies gain significant bonuses to courage, morale, and combat effectiveness
Can inspire ordinary people to perform extraordinary feats in times of need
Presence naturally draws enemy attention away from vulnerable allies
Can rally demoralized allies with displays of heroism and courage
Heroic deeds create lasting inspiration that continues to benefit allies

class_mechanics.name: Righteous Protection
class_mechanics.description: Supernatural ability to defend allies and innocents from harm
effects: Can intercept attacks meant for allies, taking reduced damage
Able to create protective auras that shield allies from harm
Gain significant defensive bonuses when protecting others
Can extend defensive abilities to cover multiple allies simultaneously
Presence creates a zone of safety that enemies find difficult to violate

class_mechanics.name: Paragon of Virtue
class_mechanics.description: Embodiment of heroic virtues that grants special abilities and resistances
effects: Gain resistance to fear, mind control, and corruption effects
Weapons deal additional damage against evil or corrupt entities
Can detect evil intentions and corruption in others
Presence weakens the resolve and power of evil entities
Can inspire redemption in those who have fallen to darkness

class_mechanics.name: Legendary Prowess
class_mechanics.description: Combat excellence that transcends ordinary human limitations
effects: Physical abilities exceed normal human limitations in critical situations
Can perform extraordinary feats of strength, speed, and endurance
Weapons and armor perform beyond their normal capabilities
Can continue fighting effectively despite severe injuries
Presence inspires awe and respect in allies and enemies alike

signature_abilities.name: Heroic Sacrifice
signature_abilities.description: Willingly take damage meant for allies, gaining tremendous power in return
mechanics: For 1 minute, intercept all attacks directed at allies within 30 meters
Damage taken from intercepted attacks is reduced by 50%
For each attack intercepted, gain stacking bonuses to strength, speed, and damage
At the end of the duration, release a wave of healing energy proportional to damage absorbed
If you would be defeated during this ability, instead remain at 1 health until it ends
Costs 100 Stamina, 50 Command Authority, and 75 Heroic Inspiration

signature_abilities.name: Banner of Hope
signature_abilities.description: Plant a magical banner that inspires allies and weakens enemies
mechanics: Create a banner that remains for 10 minutes or until destroyed
Allies within 50 meters gain significant bonuses to attack, defense, and morale
Allies are immune to fear and gain accelerated resource regeneration
Evil entities within range suffer penalties to attack and defense
The banner can be seen from great distances, rallying scattered allies
Costs 75 Stamina, 30 Command Authority, and 50 Heroic Inspiration

signature_abilities.name: Moment of Glory
signature_abilities.description: Channel heroic energy to perform extraordinary feats beyond mortal limitations
mechanics: For 3 minutes, transcend normal limitations and become a paragon of heroic might
All attributes increased by 50%, all damage dealt increased by 100%
Gain immunity to fear, mind control, and most negative status effects
Weapons and armor become temporarily legendary, gaining powerful enchantments
Presence creates an aura that heals allies and damages evil entities
Costs 50 Stamina, 100 Heroic Inspiration, and 25 Command Authority

skill_trees.name: Path of the Protector
key_abilities: Guardian's Shield: Create a protective barrier around an ally that absorbs significant damage
Sacrificial Defense: Take damage meant for nearby allies, gaining defensive bonuses in return
Bulwark of Faith: Become immovable and nearly invulnerable while defending a position

skill_trees.name: Path of Inspiration
key_abilities: Heroic Speech: Deliver an inspiring address that grants powerful buffs to all allies
Lead by Example: Your combat actions inspire similar actions from allies with enhanced effects
Beacon of Hope: Emanate an aura that continuously strengthens allies and weakens evil entities

skill_trees.name: Path of the Hero
skill_trees.focus: Personal heroic excellence and legendary feats
key_abilities: Heroic Might: Temporarily gain supernatural strength for extraordinary feats
Legendary Resilience: Ignore fatal damage once per day, returning with partial health
Epic Confrontation: Challenge a powerful enemy to single combat with significant advantages

advancement_requirements.skill_points: At least 15 points in the Inspiring Leader skill tree
advancement_requirements.alignment: Must maintain Good alignment for at least 10 levels
challenges: Protect innocent civilians from certain harm

legendary_items.name: Aegis of the Righteous
effects: Charisma increased by 5
Can extend shield protection to cover nearby allies
When blocking attacks meant for others, reflect 30% of damage back to attacker

legendary_items.name: Sword of Virtue
effects: Deals additional holy damage against evil entities
Each successful strike inspires allies, granting them small combat bonuses
Can release a wave of purifying energy that damages evil and heals allies

legendary_items.name: Mantle of the Champion
effects: Heroic Inspiration regeneration increased by 100%
Creates an aura of courage that makes allies immune to fear
When Heroic Inspiration is at maximum, gain the ability to fly for short periods

lore: Champions represent the pinnacle of heroic leadership among Commanders, having dedicated themselves to the highest ideals of honor, justice, and self-sacrifice. These paragons of virtue have transcended ordinary leadership to become living symbols of hope and courage, inspiring allies through personal example and unwavering dedication to protecting the innocent. The path to becoming a Champion requires not only exceptional combat skills and leadership abilities but also a genuine commitment to upholding moral principles even in the most challenging circumstances. Those who succeed find themselves blessed with abilities that seem to transcend mortal limitations, especially when fighting to protect others or oppose evil. Champions often serve as the moral compass of military organizations, ensuring that power is used responsibly and in service to justice rather than personal gain. Many become legendary figures whose deeds are celebrated in song and story, inspiring future generations to follow their example. Some dedicate themselves to protecting vulnerable communities from threats, while others lead crusades against powerful evil entities that threaten the world. Their presence on the battlefield can turn the tide of seemingly hopeless situations, not just through their own considerable combat prowess but through their ability to bring out the best in those who fight alongside them. Though they possess tremendous power, Champions use their abilities with humility and restraint, understanding that true heroism lies not in personal glory but in service to others and unwavering dedication to justice.
